feature: Add QueryBuilder and Insight Test Coverage
workflow_rationale: This is a code quality improvement task focused on adding test coverage to existing implementations. The QueryBuilder class exists with full functionality (532 lines) but lacks unit tests. The Insight class also needs test coverage for its SQL generation methods. This is a refactoring workflow because we are improving code quality and verifiability without changing functionality.

phases.name: QueryBuilder Unit Tests
phases.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for QueryBuilder class (query-builder.ts lines 292-523) covering all chainable methods, SQL generation, and helper functions

subtasks.description: Create test file with mock setup and tests for chainable query methods (filter, sort, orderBy, groupBy, join, limit, offset, select) - verify immutability and operation accumulation

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run query-builder.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | tail -30

test_coverage: filter(predicates) - adds FilterPredicateLocal[] to operations
sort(orders) - adds SortOrderLocal[] to operations
orderBy(orders) - alias for sort()
groupBy(columns, aggregations?) - adds group columns and AggregationLocal[]
join(other, options) - adds JoinOptionsLocal with DataFrame reference
limit(count) - adds numeric limit constraint
offset(count) - adds numeric offset constraint
select(columns) - specifies column names to select
Immutability - each method returns NEW QueryBuilder instance
subtasks.mock_structure: Mock AsyncDuckDBConnection with query() returning { toArray: () => mockData }
subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive test file with mock setup and tests for chainable query methods (filter, sort, orderBy, groupBy, join, limit, offset, select). Tests verify immutability and operation accumulation. Commit: 81a24b6

subtasks.description: Add SQL generation tests for sql(), toSQL() and helper functions (formatPredicate, buildPlan, buildSelectClause, buildOrderClause) - lines 110-195

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run query-builder.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | grep -E '(PASS|FAIL|✓|✗|sql|SQL)' | tail -30

test_coverage: formatPredicate() - standard operators (=, <, >, <=, >=, !=)
formatPredicate() - IS NULL, IS NOT NULL operators
formatPredicate() - IN, NOT IN with values array
buildPlan() - accumulates filters, sorts, joins, group, limit, offset, select from operations
buildSelectClause() - handles selectColumns, groupColumns, aggregations
buildOrderClause() - formats ORDER BY with direction
sql()/toSQL() - generates complete SELECT...FROM...WHERE...GROUP BY...ORDER BY...LIMIT...OFFSET query
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive SQL generation tests covering: basic SELECT queries, WHERE clause generation (formatPredicate), ORDER BY clause (buildOrderClause), GROUP BY clause (buildSelectClause), LIMIT/OFFSET, complex query generation (buildPlan), toSQL() alias, and edge cases. 522 lines added.

subtasks.description: Add tests for execution methods (rows, count, preview, run) with mocked query results

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run query-builder.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | grep -E '(rows|count|preview|run)' | tail -20

test_coverage: rows() - calls conn.query() and returns toArray() result
count() - wraps query in COUNT(*) subquery
preview(limit=10) - calls limit(10).rows()
ensureLoaded() - returns tableName if already set
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive unit tests for QueryBuilder execution methods (rows, count, preview, run) with mocked query results. Tests cover: rows() returning results as array of records with all operation combinations; count() with COUNT(*) subquery wrapping and proper exclusion of limit/offset/sort/select; preview() with default and custom limits; run() with COPY TO ARROW format and BrowserDataFrame.create; error handling for all execution methods. Commit: da09f1d

subtasks.description: Add tests for static batchQuery() method (lines 495-522) - test empty array, single query, multiple queries

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run query-builder.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | grep -E '(batch|Batch)' | tail -10

test_coverage: batchQuery([]) - returns empty array
batchQuery([q1]) - returns [[result1]] for single query
batchQuery([q1, q2, q3]) - uses UNION ALL with _batch_idx, partitions results correctly
subtasks.notes: Added 15 comprehensive tests for static batchQuery() method covering: empty array (2 tests), single query (3 tests), multiple queries (8 tests), and error handling (2 tests). Tests verify UNION ALL batching, _batch_idx partitioning, result stripping, and proper error propagation.

subtasks.description: Add edge case tests: empty operations, NULL values, special characters in identifiers, multiple filters combination

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run query-builder.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | grep -E '(edge|NULL|special|empty|quote)' | head -20

test_coverage: Empty operations - generates SELECT * FROM table_name
NULL values - formatValue returns 'NULL', IS NULL handled by operator
Special characters - quoteIdent escapes double quotes by doubling them
Multiple filter operations - combines all predicates with AND
Date values - formatValue returns ISO string in quotes
Boolean values - formatValue returns TRUE/FALSE uppercase
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive edge case tests for QueryBuilder covering: empty operations (empty groupBy, empty aggregations, chained empty ops, empty predicates followed by real filter); NULL value handling (IS NULL, IS NOT NULL, null with equality, undefined as NULL, NULL in IN operator, combining NULL checks with other predicates); special characters in identifiers (spaces, double quotes, unicode, numeric prefixes, single quotes in values, IN operator values); multiple filters combination (equality, comparison operators, IN/NOT IN, IS NULL combined, complex queries with all filter types); edge case value types (empty string, zero, negative numbers, floating point, false boolean, long strings, newlines, tabs, mixed types in IN). Commit: 706cf05

phases.name: Insight SQL Generation Tests
phases.description: Create unit tests for Insight class (insight.ts) SQL generation methods including toSQL(), generateSimpleSQL(), generateJoinSQL() and helper methods

subtasks.description: Create Insight test file with DataTableInfo and InsightConfiguration fixtures, test constructor and property accessors

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run insight.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | tail -30
verification.expected: Insight constructor and accessor tests pass

test_coverage: Constructor - throws error without name
Constructor - throws error without baseTable
Constructor - generates id if not provided
Property accessors - id, name, baseTable, selectedFields, metrics, filters, groupBy, orderBy, limit, joins, config
subtasks.fixture_structure: DataTableInfo with id, name, dataFrameId, fields array (DataTableField[])
subtasks.notes: Created insight.test.ts with comprehensive test fixtures (createField, createDataTableInfo, createInsightConfig) and tests for constructor validation and all property accessors. Tests cover: constructor with valid config, ID generation, validation errors for missing name/baseTable, default initialization of optional arrays, and all accessor methods.

subtasks.description: Add tests for generateSimpleSQL() - basic SELECT, WHERE, ORDER BY, LIMIT without aggregation

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run insight.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | grep -E '(simple|Simple|SELECT)' | tail -20

test_coverage: toSQL() - generates SELECT col1, col2 FROM df_tablename
toSQL() with filters - adds WHERE clause using buildWhereClause
toSQL() with orderBy - adds ORDER BY clause
toSQL() with limit - adds LIMIT clause
toSQL() with aggregation - adds GROUP BY and metric functions
subtasks.notes: Added 25 comprehensive tests for generateSimpleSQL() covering: basic SELECT with all columns, WHERE clause with various operators (=, >, <, >=, <=, IS NULL, IS NOT NULL, IN, NOT IN), ORDER BY with asc/desc and multiple columns, LIMIT clause handling, combined clauses testing proper SQL ordering, and edge cases (missing dataFrameId, internal fields exclusion). Committed as b0678cc.

subtasks.description: Add tests for generateJoinSQL() - JOIN query generation with field aliasing, duplicate column handling

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run insight.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | grep -E '(join|JOIN|alias)' | tail -20

test_coverage: toSQL() with single join - generates INNER/LEFT/RIGHT/OUTER JOIN
Duplicate column handling - aliases with tableName.columnName format
Join key fields - proper ON clause generation
Error handling - throws when dataFrameId missing
Error handling - throws when join key fields not found
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive tests for generateJoinSQL(): basic JOIN types (INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, OUTER), field aliasing for duplicate columns, auto-generated table name handling, aggregation with JOINs, combined clauses, and error handling. Commit: 38bfdd4

subtasks.description: Add tests for immutable update methods (with, withSelectedFields, withMetrics, etc.) and utility methods (toJSON, fromJSON, hasAnalytics, isReady, getDescription)

verification.command: cd packages/engine-browser && npx vitest run insight.test.ts --reporter=verbose 2>&1 | grep -E '(with|immutable|utility)' | tail -20
verification.expected: Immutable update and utility method tests pass

test_coverage: with(updates) - returns new Insight with merged config
withSelectedFields, withMetrics, withFilters, withGroupBy, withOrderBy, withLimit, withName - convenience methods
toJSON() - returns plain InsightConfiguration object
fromJSON() - creates Insight from config
hasAnalytics() - returns true if metrics, groupBy, or filters exist
isReady() - returns true if selectedFields exist or hasAnalytics
getDescription() - returns human-readable description
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive tests for immutable update methods (with, withSelectedFields, withMetrics, withFilters, withGroupBy, withOrderBy, withLimit, withName) and utility methods (toJSON, fromJSON, hasAnalytics, isReady, getDescription). Tests cover: immutability guarantees, ID preservation, property updates, chaining, round-trip serialization, analytics detection, and description generation. 740 lines of test code added.
